G

GameClient - Class in system
Client class that contains the socket to used for communication to the server, as well as protocols for network messages.
GameClient(int, String, GameControllerListener, String) - Constructor for class system.GameClient
Constructor that creates a new GameClient object with a specified name.
GameController - Class in system
Controller for the game, which calls methods in both the view and model.
GameController(GameModel, GameView) - Constructor for class system.GameController
Parameterized constructor for GameController.
GameController.AboutListener - Class in system
Listens for an "About" action click and triggers the display of the rules.
GameController.CardDrawListener - Class in system
Listens for a card draw action and triggers the corresponding action.
GameController.CardPlayListener - Class in system
Listens for a card play action and triggers the corresponding action with the card played.
GameController.ChatSendButtonListener - Class in system
Listens for the action to send a chat message and triggers the sending of the message.
GameController.DisconnectListener - Class in system
Listens for a disconnect action.
GameController.JoinGameListener - Class in system
Listens for a join game action.
GameController.LangEnglishListener - Class in system
Listens for a change to the language to English.
GameController.LangFrenchListener - Class in system
Listens for a change to the language to French.
GameController.MultiPlayerListener - Class in system
Listens for a multiplayer game action.
GameController.MusicToggleListener - Class in system
Listens for a toggle of the music setting.
GameController.SinglePlayerListener - Class in system
Listens for the start of a round in single-player mode.
GameController.SoundToggleListener - Class in system
Listens for a toggle of the sound setting.
GameControllerListener - Interface in system
Interface that handles network call/responses.
gameMode - Variable in class system.GameController
The selected game mode (e.g., single-player or multiplayer).
GameModel - Class in system
Contains logic and objects/collectinos needed to process game logic.
GameModel() - Constructor for class system.GameModel
Default constructor for GameModel
GameServer - Class in system
The server holds a Vector of sockets, representing each client connected to it.
GameServer(int, GameControllerListener, int) - Constructor for class system.GameServer
Initializes a new Server and starts listening for packets on the socket.
GameServer.ClientHandler - Class in system
Private inner class that handles incoming packets from clients.
gameStartDialog() - Method in class system.GameView
Shows the dialog for when a new game starts.
GameView - Class in system
The View, where all UI elements are generated and drawn.
GameView() - Constructor for class system.GameView
Default constructor for the GameView.
gatherNetworkInfo(boolean) - Method in class system.GameController
Collects "network info" from clients or host, depending on the boolean passed to it.
